name: The Shield Spectre
description:
(fullscreen recommended!)

If the movement is not functioning correctly, try reloading the page a few times. I couldn't figure out the source of this bug. Sorry for the inconvenience.

While exploring a dangerous dungeon, you meet a friendly spirit! They change form into a shield to help you defeat the evil ghosts of the dungeon. 

Detailed tutorial:

wasd/Arrow keys to move

Shield points toward mouse, left click to throw it.

Touch a glowing statue to reclaim your weapon.

3 hits, and you're out!

3 types of ghosts:

Ghost 1:

Spawns quickly, Moves fast, shoots fast

Ghost 2:

Starts spawning at 50 points. Moves slow. Shoots 3 projectiles at once.

Ghost 3:

Starts spawning at 150 points. Moves very slow. Shoots 10 projectiles around itself.

Go for a highscore!
